about.title: About Us
about.description: Al Salam in Helsingborg is an Islamic association and mosque. A center for Muslims to turn to in all aspects of their lives, from prayer and jummah to marriage, knowledge, guidance in matters
about.version-description: Muslims should feel at home in the country, be able to practice and fully exercise their religion as Swedish Muslims.

activities.title: Our Values
activities.knowledge-description: Seeking knowledge is a central part of every Muslim's life journey – a path to understanding, faith, and development.
activities.community-description: We pray together, break our fast together, and share life in a warm and inclusive community that Islam encourages.
activities.prayer-description: The mosque is open for all five daily prayers – a place for spiritual presence and inner peace.

services.title: Services
services.marriage-description: The mosque offers the opportunity to enter into marriage according to Muslim tradition. The ceremony is performed in the mosque by our marriage officiant and imam. After the ceremony, a marriage certificate is issued which has only religious validity.
services.koran-arabic-school-description: Teaching in Arabic and Quran The mosque offers teaching in the Arabic language and the Quran for children from 6 years old and up. The teaching is open both to Arabic-speaking children and to children who do not have
services.prayer-times-description: We display and maintain daily prayer times on our website as well as in the mosque. Times are updated regularly according to the current calendar for the sun's position.
services.jumaa-description: The sermon is held in the mosque every Jummah (Friday) and begins at the time of Dhuhr prayer.
services.fatwa-description: If you need guidance on an Islamic legal matter (fiqh), you are welcome to contact us via email.
services.family-counseling-description: If you need help or guidance in a family matter or conflict, you can contact us via email.

company.title: Corporate Sponsorship
company.subtitle: Support our activities through corporate sponsorship
company.why-sponsor-description: By sponsoring Al-Salam Mosque, your company contributes to strengthening our community and supporting our important services. Your sponsorship helps us continue to offer valuable resources and programs for Muslims in the Helsingborg area.
company.honorary-membership-description: All corporate sponsors receive honorary membership in the Al-Salam association in recognition of their valuable support.
company.question: Do you have questions about our sponsorship packages?
company.contact_description: We are happy to help find the package that best suits your company.
